mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (notice_title, notice_content, cust_id, board_img, notice_date) VALUES (#{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{custId}, #{boardImg}, #{noticeDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_content = #{noticeContent}, notice_date = #{noticeDate}, cust_id = #{custId}, board_img = #{boardImg} WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.select: SELECT notice_no AS noticeNo, notice_title AS noticeTitle, notice_content AS noticeContent, notice_date AS noticeDate, cust_id AS custId, board_img AS boardImg FROM board WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
SELECT notice_no AS noticeNo, notice_title AS noticeTitle, notice_content AS noticeContent, notice_date AS noticeDate, cust_id AS custId, board_img AS boardImg FROM board ORDER BY notice_date DESC

SELECT notice_no AS noticeNo, notice_title AS noticeTitle, notice_content AS noticeContent, notice_date AS noticeDate, cust_id AS custId, board_img AS boardImg FROM board ORDER BY notice_date DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

SELECT notice_no AS noticeNo, notice_title AS noticeTitle, notice_content AS noticeContent, notice_date AS noticeDate, cust_id AS custId, board_img AS boardImg FROM board WHERE notice_title LIKE CONCAT('%', COALESCE(#{searchKeyword}, ''), '%') ORDER BY notice_date DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board WHERE notice_title LIKE CONCAT('%', COALESCE(#{searchKeyword}, ''), '%')

SELECT notice_no AS noticeNo, notice_title AS noticeTitle, notice_content AS noticeContent, notice_date AS noticeDate, cust_id AS custId, board_img AS boardImg FROM board WHERE cust_id = #{custId} ORDER BY notice_date DESC
